roleset.name: travel via parachute
roleset.note: PARACHUTE-V NOTES: The use of ArgA is required in the first example, making this another example of a verb-of-motion. (from parachute.01-v)

example.name: with causal agent
example.text: If all goes well, it will parachute a probe into the dense Jovian atmosphere in July 1995 to pick up detailed data about gases that may be similar to the material from which the solar system was formed 4.6 billion years ago.
example.arg: to pick up detailed data about gases that may be similar to the material from which the solar system was formed 4.6 billion years ago

example.name: just transitive
example.text: With airline deals in a tailspin, [legendary Wall Street trader Michael Steinhardt]-1 could have trouble *trace*-1 parachuting out of USAir Group, traders say.

example.name: note the arg1-DIR
example.text: ``It doesn't make sense *trace* to parachute out at this price, ''Mr. Steinhardt says, though he has stopped his takeover talk and now commends USAir managers' ``operating skills.''
